exceptions.tactic: intros U T D f x Hloc Hcont.
intros U' T D f x Hloc Hcont.

ctx: intros U' T' D f x Hloc Hcont.

original: intros U T D f x Hloc Hcont. unfold continuous, filterlim. intros P HP. unfold locally in Hloc. destruct Hloc as [eps Heps]. unfold filtermap. exists eps. intros y Hy. apply HP. apply Hcont. apply (Heps y Hy).
